frontmatter.title: Finding My Voice
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: In my early 20's my first blog failed before it ever started. I struggled with finding my voice. To be candid, I had a voice, just not one I could publish. I feared my voice would betray me as youthful, inexperienced, and stupid, because I was all these things.

frontmatter.title: F*uck the Marshmallow: Greatness is Upon You
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: You might call this a rant.  This gets in the face of the American fable: work hard, persevere, succeed.  At first this new research was hard to swallow because I believe the fable.  But now, I’ve taken the time to ponder. Discomfort has subsided. Now I’m pissed. Separate the research from the politics.
frontmatter.hero_alt: F*uck the Marshmallow: Greatness is Upon You
